property.name: confirmationMsg
property.value: Warning: Running switch followed by manually changing the Repository URL in the Versioning Manager for this versioned directory is supported on the root of the versioned directory only. Currently the Repository URL variable is used in many commands as a prefix, so if you switch any directory other than the root, the affected commands will not work as expected and could lead to very confusing results. A better way to obtain the prefix will be implemented in a future release. Would you like to continue?
